nodes.text: Ulek Talstin was a male brigand who worked for Jabba Desilijic Tiure during the Galactic Civil War. He was killed by a spacer dispatched by D'Mayna Stallaphalat.

Ulek Talstin was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its shut down on December 15, 2011. Due to the nature of many older quests in Star Wars Galaxies, the species and appearance of Ulek Talstin changed each time a player performed this quest. Species that Talstin could appear as included, but were not necessarily limited to, Aqualish and Rodians. Therefore, it is impossible to verify the canonical species of Talstin. However, the quest dialogue given by Stella indicated that Ulek Talstin was a male.
